titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special expensing rules for certain film and television productions.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special expensing rules for certain film and television productions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2016 the expensing rules for the costs of certain film and television productions.
